TopicTitle: A List of Kerbal Words I know

Articles.Content:
Nonano: Don't do that!

AAAHGH!: WHY! WHY!

Nonigou: What to do? What to do?

And these are all the words I know because you know, the Kerbal's language is so hard to learn.

But I will edit to add more words as I hear them.

(BTW, The Kerbal Language is called "lonapsH"!)
